articles.description: Djokovic hasn't been vaccinated against COVID-19 and he can't enter the United States.
articles.content: Novak Djokovic's name has appeared on the US Open entry list but there is no guarantee that the Serb will be eligible to compete at the tournament. Djokovic, 35, hasn't been vaccinated against COVID-… [+1676 chars]

articles.title: Commonwealth Games 2022: India's top medal contenders - Sports News - India Today
articles.description: India won 66 medals in 2018 and following the Tokyo Olympics high last year, the Indian athletes will be hoping to put their best foot forward in Birmingham. Here's a look at some of the biggest medal prospects for India at the Commonwealth Games 2022.
articles.content: After having achieved their best-ever performance at Olympic Games in Tokyo last year, India will be geared up to put their best foot forward at the Commonwealth Games, starting July 28 in Birmingham… [+5701 chars]
